biotools.summary: PERISCOPE-Opt predicts the optimal fermentation conditions and expression yields of recombinant protein in the periplasm of Escherichia coli (E. coli) based on the user-specified amino acid sequence of the protein and an N-terminal signal peptide.

bioschemas.name: PERISCOPE-Opt
